property.name: hfile.format.version
property.description: The HFile format version to use for new files. Version 3 adds support for tags in hfiles (See http://hbase.apache.org/book.html#hbase.tags). Distributed Log Replay requires that tags are enabled.

property.name: hbase.zookeeper.property.clientPort
property.description: Property from ZooKeeper's config zoo.cfg. The port at which the clients will connect.

property.name: hbase.zookeeper.quorum
property.description: Comma separated list of servers in the ZooKeeper Quorum. For example, "host1.mydomain.com,host2.mydomain.com,host3.mydomain.com". By default this is set to localhost for local and pseudo-distributed modes of operation. For a fully-distributed setup, this should be set to a full list of ZooKeeper quorum servers. If HBASE_MANAGES_ZK is set in hbase-env.sh this is the list of servers which we will start/stop ZooKeeper on.

property.name: hbase.zookeeper.property.dataDir
property.description: Property from ZooKeeper's config zoo.cfg. The directory where the snapshot is stored.
